    • Method Detail

      • avgRGB

        public static void avgRGB(MyImage img,
          int thresholdValue)
        This method will threshold the image using the thresholdValue. For a given pixel at coordinate (x,y) average pixel value is avgPixelValue = (r+g+b)/3 If avgPixelValue >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK.
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.
        thresholdValue - value to be compared with the average pixel value.

      • toBinary

        public static void toBinary(MyImage img,
            int thresholdValue)
        This method will threshold the image using thresholdValue passed. This method computes p = (0.2126*r + 0.7152*g + 0.0722*b) If p >= thresholdValue then set pixel to WHITE else BLACK.
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.
        thresholdValue - value to be compared with the average pixel value.

      • redValue

        public static void redValue(MyImage img,
            int thresholdValue)
        This method will threshold using RED value of the pixel. For a given pixel at coordinate (x,y) If R >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to white else set Pixel (x,y) to black
        Parameters:
        img - The red image to threshold.
        thresholdValue - value to be compared with the R pixel value [0-255].

      • greenValue

        public static void greenValue(MyImage img,
              int thresholdValue)
        This method will threshold using GREEN value of the pixel. For a given pixel at coordinate (x,y) If G >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to white else set Pixel (x,y) to black
        Parameters:
        img - The green image to threshold.
        thresholdValue - value to be compared with the G pixel value [0-255].

      • blueValue

        public static void blueValue(MyImage img,
             int thresholdValue)
        This method will threshold using BLUE value of the pixel. For a given pixel at coordinate (x,y) If B >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to white else set Pixel (x,y) to black
        Parameters:
        img - The blue image to threshold.
        thresholdValue - value to be compared with the R pixel value [0-255].

      • auto

        public static void auto(MyImage img)
        This method will threshold the image with the thresholdValue calculated for the image. If avgOfRGB >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.

      • auto_usingRedValue

        public static void auto_usingRedValue(MyImage img)
        This method will threshold the image with thresholdValue calculated considering red value of the pixels. If redValueOfPixel >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.

      • auto_usingGreenValue

        public static void auto_usingGreenValue(MyImage img)
        This method will threshold the image with thresholdValue calculated using green value of the pixels. If greenValueOfPixel >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.

      • auto_usingBlueValue

        public static void auto_usingBlueValue(MyImage img)
        This method will threshold the image with thresholdValue calculated using blue value of the pixels. If blueValueOfPixel >= thresholdValue then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.

      • adaptiveThreshold_Mean

        public static void adaptiveThreshold_Mean(MyImage img,
                          int maskSize,
                          int C)
        This method will threshold the image. It will generate a binary image. This method will calculate the mean of the pixels under a mask of dimension: size x size. If value of pixel(x,y) > mean then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK.
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.
        maskSize - The size of the mask. [3,5,7,9,...]
        C - The constant value that is subtracted from mean. [3,7,10,...]

      • adaptiveThreshold_Median

        public static void adaptiveThreshold_Median(MyImage img,
                            int maskSize,
                            int C)
        This method will threshold the image. It will generate a binary image. This method will calculate the median of the pixels under a mask of dimension: size x size. If value of pixel(x,y) > median then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK.
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.
        maskSize - The size of the mask. [3,5,7,9,...]
        C - The constant value that is subtracted from median. [3,7,10,...]

      • adaptiveThreshold_MaxMin

        public static void adaptiveThreshold_MaxMin(MyImage img,
                            int maskSize,
                            int C)
        This method will threshold the image. It will generate a binary image. This method will calculate the max and min value of the pixels under a mask of dimension: size x size. t = (max+min)/2 - C; If value of pixel(x,y) > t then set Pixel (x,y) to WHITE else set Pixel (x,y) to BLACK.
        Parameters:
        img - the Image object passed on which thresholding is performed.
        maskSize - The size of the mask. [3,5,7,9,...]
        C - The constant value that is subtracted from median. [3,7,10,...]
